title: On-base activities
text:
Oct. 31, 6-9 p.m., Halloween Zombie paintball. ITT, 226-3555 (Bldg. 973) Oct. 9-12, 6:30 a.m.-6 p.m., Tokyo Disneyland, $380 adult, $270 ages 4-11, $80 ages 3 & younger. 
YOKOSUKA On Facebook: tinyurl.com/yzd4tqn Tours Oct. 9-12, 10-11:45 p.m., Hiroshima & Iwakuni overnight, $631 adult-single, $534 adult-twin, $481 ages 12-14/twin, $448 ages 6-11/twin, $316 Blue Jacket-single, $267 Blue Jacket-twin; Oct. 12, 5:30 a.m.-9 p.m., Mount Fuji sightseeing, $58 adults, $35 ages 6-11, $25 children, $29 Blue Jacket; Oct. 17, 7:15 a.m.-7:45 p.m., Tateyama City Presents – Autumn Special Discount Nanso Satomi Legendary Samurai Parade Festival, $23 adults, $16 ages 6-11, $12 children, $12 Blue Jacket; Oct. 18, 6:45 a.m.-8:30 p.m., Flower Owl Park & Healing Village Nenba, $55 adult, $35 ages 6-11, $22 children, $38 Blue Jacket; 4:30 a.m.-11:30 p.m., Goshikinuma Nature Trail & Tsuruga Castle, $69 adult, $53 ages 15-17, $46 ages 6-14, $35 Blue Jacket; Oct. 22, 4:45 a.m.-9 p.m., Nikko sightseeing, $68 adult, $50 ages 12-14, $43 ages 6-11, $26 children, $34 Blue Jacket. Fitness & Wellness, 243-4486 Oct. 14, 11:30 a.m., Navy Birthday Energy Awareness 5K, Purdy Gym; Oct. 24, 9 a.m., Pumpkin Run, Purdy Gym; Nov. 13, 11:30 a.m., 5K Turkey Trifecta, Purdy Gym; Nov. 22, 8 a.m., Fall Bike Ride & Clinic, Purdy Gym. Outdoor Recreation, 243-5732 Oct. 9, 7:45 a.m.-8:30 p.m., Niijima Island surfing camp/ snorkeling for experienced surfer only, $300, $150 Blue Jacket; Oct. 10, 8:30 a.m.-6 p.m., Takatori-yama rock climbing, $50, $25 Blue Jacket. Single Sailor Liberty, 243-7346 Oct. 9, 6 p.m., Texas Hold’em Tourney; Oct. 10, 10 a.m., Asakusa train tour. Sports & special events Oct. 14, 6 p.m., Street Drum Corps in concert, free, 243-5215; Nov. 7, 10 a.m.-3 p.m., Travel Fair; Nov. 8, 10 a.m., super bingo; Nov. 14, 7 p.m., Switchfoot in concert, free, 243-5215. Community Center, 243-6713 or 046-816-6713 Oct. 17, 1:30 p.m., Yokota 2015 Annual Arts & Crafts Photo Contest, photo display Oct. 10-Nov. 21; Oct. 24, 11 a.m.-3 p.m., Yokosuka Family Fun Community Flea Market, $12 registration fee. 
YOKOTA AIR BASE Visit the Facebook page at tinyurl.com/bqnd4jf, Channel 22 or www.YokotaSupport.com . Events Oct. 10-Nov. 21, 2015 Photo Contest on display, categories: scenic, abstract, photo essay, digital creation, people, Arts & Crafts Center, sign up by Oct. 17, 225-8133; Oct. 17, 8 a.m., Sprint Triathlon (400-meter swim, 15 km bike, 5K run), $10 individuals, $30 team, ages 16+, race briefing Oct. 15, Samurai Fitness Center Fitness Annex Conference Room, 2nd floor. ITT Nov. 1, 8 a.m.-6:30 p.m., Tokyo Motor Show at Tokyo Big Sight, $50 ages 16+, $30 ages 4-15, $30 ages 3 & younger. Outdoor Recreation, 225-4552/4553 Oct. 17, 6:30 a.m.-5:30 p.m., trout fishing, $75 ages 13+, $55 ages 7-12, sign up by Oct. 13; 6 a.m.-3 p.m., creek hiking, $40 ages 10+, sign up by Oct. 13; Oct. 24, 6:30 a.m.-5:30 p.m., paragliding, $100 ages 13+, sign up by Oct. 21; Oct. 31, 7 a.m.-1 p.m., Tour de Tama, $40 ages 13+, sign up by Oct. 27. 
CAMP ZAMA Outdoor Recreation Center and Leisure Travel Service, 263-4671, www.armymwrjapan.com/calendar Oct. 10, 4 a.m.-11:30 p.m., Shirakawago & Hida Takayama, $69; Oct. 11, 2-10 p.m., Oktoberfest in Odaiba, $18 ages 20+, $15 BOSS members ages 20+; Oct. 12, 7 a.m.-11 p.m., Disneyland/DisneySea, $20 transportation only; Oct. 17, 5 a.m.-5 p.m., Ichinokurasawa hiking, $49 ages 18+, $30 BOSS members; 11:30 a.m.-9:30 p.m., Kawagoe Festival, $25; Oct. 18, 8 a.m.-6 p.m., Tokyo by Day, $39 ages 12+, $33 ages 6-11, $29 ages 4 & 5, $18 ages 3 & younger; Oct. 24, 5 a.m.-1 p.m., shore fishing at Hiratsuka, $19; 5 a.m.-9 p.m., Nikko excursion, $68 ages 15+, $60 ages 6-14, $50 ages 5 & younger; Oct. 25, 9 a.m.-6 p.m., Hello Kitty Land, $17; Oct. 31, 5 a.m.-9 p.m., Mashiko Pottery Festival, $33; Nov. 1, 5 a.m.-8 p.m., Nishizawa Gorge hiking, $44 ages 12+; 7 a.m.-6 p.m., Lake Kawaguchi Ropeway ride & monkey performance, $53 ages 21+, $43 ages 6-11, $38 ages 3-5, $28 ages 2 & younger; Nov. 8, 7:30 a.m.-7 p.m., Fuji-Q Highland Amusement Park, $20 ages 18+, $15 Blue Jacket; 8 a.m.-4 p.m., field archery for beginners, $47 ages 18+, $42 ages 9-17, sign up by Oct. 19. Guam 
ANDERSEN AIR FORCE BASE Boonie Stomps, 787-4238 Oct. 10, 9 a.m., Alutom Falls/Upper Sigua (3 hours, 2 miles, medium/difficult); Oct. 17, 9 a.m., Ben’s Falls to Mount Lamlam (4 hours, 2 mikes, difficult); Oct. 24, 9 a.m., Upper Lonfit River (4 hours, 4 miles, difficult); 9 a.m., Moonie Stomp - Priest’s Pools (2 hours, 1 mile, medium); Oct. 31, 9 a.m., San Carlos Falls (4 hours, 3 miles, difficult); Nov. 7, 9 a.m., Maguagua Falls (4 hours, 3 miles, difficult); Nov. 14, 9 a.m., Tarzan swim hole (4 hours, 2 miles, medium). Coral Reef Fitness Center, 366-6100 Oct. 16, 3:30 p.m., dodgeball tournament, register by Oct. 9; Mon., Tue. & Wed., 7 p.m., Thu., 9:40 a.m., Zumba, free. Gecko Lanes, 366-5117 Oct. 10, 12:30 p.m., 9-Pin No-Tap tournament, $25, sign up by Oct. 9, open to all with base access. Hotspot, 366-2339 Oct. 9, 6 p.m., movie; Oct. 12, 5:30 p.m., ping pong tournament; Oct. 21, 7 p.m., Don Barnharts’ Laughter for the Troops comedy show, Top of the Rock, free. Outdoor Recreation, 366-5204 Oct. 10, 7:45 a.m., WWII tour, $15; Oct. 17, 4:45 a.m.-2:30 p.m., deep sea fishing trip, $85, transportation and use of fishing gear included, sign up in advance. 
NAVAL BASE GUAM Oct. 12-30, basketball registration for season Nov. 16-Jan. 23, $55 ages 6-18. Liberty, (671) 564-2280 Oct. 17, 6 p.m., skee ball tournament; Oct. 21, shopping shuttle: Chamorro Village, 6 p.m. at Liberty Center, 6:16 p.m. at Camp Covington; Oct. 24, 8:30 a.m., hike & snorkel Ague Cove, $5; Oct. 31, 6 p.m., Halloween Party, come in with a costume or come & decorate a scary mask. Okinawa 
Tours, 646-3502, www.mccsokinawa.com/tours Oct. 9, 9 a.m.-2 p.m., Bios on the Hill, $44 adults, $20 ages 4-12, free ages 3 & younger; Oct. 10, 9 a.m.-2 p.m., tea ceremony with summer kimono, $48 adults, $38 ages 3-11, free ages 2 & younger; 9:30 a.m.-5 p.m., Kouri Island, $23 adults, $16 ages 3-11, free ages 2 & younger; Oct. 11, noon-8 p.m., Naha Tug of War, $21 adults, $14 ages 3-14, free ages 2 & younger; Oct. 12, 9 a.m.-3 p.m., Okinawa West Coast tour, $43 adults, $26 ages 6-12, $11 ages 3-5, free ages 2 & younger; Oct. 16, 5:30 a.m.-9:30 p.m., Urashima Dinner Theater, $68 with half lobster adults, $52 without lobster adult, $38 ages 6-12, $34 ages 3-5, free ages 2 & younger (no meal); Oct. 17, 8 a.m-4 p.m., fun day at Okuma, $20 adult, $13 ages 3-11, free ages 2 & younger; 9 a.m.-5 p.m., Shuri Castle & Naha, $23 adult, $16 ages 3-11, free ages 2 & younger; Oct. 18, noon-5 p.m., Uruma City Bullfighting, $20 adult, $14 ages 3-11, free ages 2 & younger; Oct. 18, 20, 22, 23, 24, 25, 26, 27, 29, 30 and 31, 6-10 p.m., Spooky Sites tour, $20 adult, $13 ages 3-11, free ages 2 & younger; Nov. 1, 9 a.m.-4 p.m., Shuri Castle Festival, $23 adult, $16 ages 3-11, free ages 2 & younger; 6 a.m.-10 p.m., Last Spooky Sites tour, $20 adult, $13 ages 3-11, free ages 2 & younger; Nov. 2, 8:45 a.m.-3 p.m., Island transportation, $10 adult, $5 ages 3-11, free ages 2 & younger.
